allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Commander Finder manual search mode to commander recommendations

Adds a new "Commander Finder" tab alongside the existing "From Collection"
tab in the Commander Recommendations modal. Users can manually select
color identity, strategy themes \(20 options\), and creature type to search
for commanders matching their desired playstyle via Scryfall API.
EOF
\)")
